name: Public Assets Management System
description: Designed a web-based system to manage and track government assets, improving accountability and resource allocation.
challenges: Implementing role-based access control for multiple departments
Optimizing query performance for large asset lists
outcomes: Streamlined reporting process for government audits

name: Fitaid (AI Fitness Assistant)
description: Developed an AI-driven assistant integrating APIs and data analytics to provide personalized fitness recommendations.
challenges: Integrating diverse health data sensors via APIs
Managing real-time data ingestion and processing
outcomes: Successfully integrated with 3 major wearable brands

name: Grepsr Internal QA Tools
description: Developed internal QA tools and lightweight widgets to automate daily operational tasks, including data validation and error detection.
challenges: Building a user-friendly CLI for non-technical staff
Ensuring tool compatibility with various data formats (JSON, CSV, XML)
outcomes: Adopted as a standard tool for the entire engineering team

name: freelanceNep
description: A platform for hiring semi-skilled workers, with a data-driven recommendation system.
challenges: Matching workers based on proximity and skill level
Managing high-concurrency during peak hiring hours
Developing a secure payment and escrow system
outcomes: Onboarded 500+ workers in the first three months
Average worker response time reduced to under 30 minutes
